featured.text: But without that activity, blood sugar levels and blood pressure keep creeping up, steadily damaging the inside of the arteries and increasing the risk of diabetes, heart disease, stroke, and other serious diseases.
Somehow, problems creep in, resentments build, and communication __(37)__.

definition.zh_def: 緩慢而悄無聲息地移動或行動。
definition.en_def: To move slowly and quietly in a stealthy manner.
definition.example: The cat began to creep towards the unsuspecting mouse.
